interface.name: wl_webos_foreign
interface.description:
This interface defines a way to associate one or more foreign surfaces from different clients or a punch-through region to a surface that acts the main window.
You can set a region on the main window where a foreign surface or a punch-through region can be placed. It is called "exported" region or window in this protocol. Then you can request the compositor to punch through that region or attach another surface as an "imported" content.

enum.name: webos_exported_type
enum.description: This indicates the type of the content that the exported window can show.

request.name: export_element
request.description: Requests to create an exported window on a given surface.

request.name: import_element
request.description: Requests an import object that can be associated with a given exported window.

arg.name: window_id
arg.summary: window_id of associated exported window assigned by compositor

interface.name: wl_webos_exported
interface.description: This interface defines operations and notifications on an exported window.

request.name: set_exported_window
request.description: Sets the exported window with source and destination regions.

event.name: window_id_assigned

description.summary: window is associated with this wl_webos_exported

event.description: Notifies window_id of the exported window.

interface.name: wl_webos_imported

description.summary: interface for imported content or punchthrough region

interface.description: This interface defines operations and notifications on an imported object.

enum.name: surface_alignment
enum.description: The alignment of an imported surface on the associated exported window.

request.name: set_surface_alignment
request.description: Sets the alignment of the imported surface.

request.name: attach_punchthrough
request.description: Requests a punch-through on the exporetd window associated with this import object.

request.name: detach_punchthrough
request.description: Requests to detatch the punch-through from the exported window associated with this import object.

request.name: attach_surface
request.description: Requests to attach the surface as imported to the associated exported window.

request.name: detach_surface
request.description: Requests to detach the surface as imported from the associated exported window.

event.name: destination_region_changed
event.description: Notifies the change of the destination region of associated exported window.
